snippet: Roger Chapman of England won the United States Senior Open by two strokes after shooting a four-under 66 Sunday in Lake Orion, Mich., to finish the tournament at 10 under.
abstract: Roger Chapman of England wins the United States Senior Open by two strokes; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Roger Chapman of England won the United States Senior Open by two strokes after shooting a four-under 66 Sunday in Lake Orion, Mich., to finish the tournament at 10 under.

headline.seo: Roger Chapman Wins U.S. Senior Open
